title: Oceans
description: The ocean biome covers about 70 percent of Earth's surface. In Oceans, students will learn about the unique zones of oceans, their underwater landforms, ocean animals and their adaptions, and the importance of oceans to humans. Students will also learn about the different features of this biome as well as how oceans affect weather and climate. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify the main idea and supporting details.
